Charles Oesterling

  1. Foster Name: Charles Oesterling
  2. Foster Family: John S. Streeter
  3. Location of Family: David City, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: David City, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 8
  7. Date of Birth: 1889-08-11, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Source: David City Banner Press, 5 February 1981; World War I Draft Registration Card; OTR, 127, 50; David City News, 21 October 1897; Wahoo Democrat, 14 October 1897; Eloise Thomsen Corres. (see Osterling).
